entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
